text: Magic in the Moonlight is a 2014 American comedy-drama movie. This is set on the French Riviera in the 1920s. Marcia Gay Harden, Colin Firth and Emma Stone star in the movie. Woody Allen directed the movie. This movie was released on July 25, 2014. == Other websites == * Category:2014 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 1920s
title: Magic in the Moonlight
